question: How do I get started with LinguaCraft?
answer: Getting started is easy! Simply create a free account, take our placement test to determine your English level, and choose from our personalized course recommendations. You can start learning immediately with our interactive lessons.

question: What English levels do you support?
answer: We support all levels from complete beginner (A1) to advanced (C2) according to the Common European Framework of Reference (CEFR). Our adaptive learning system adjusts to your pace and skill level.

question: Can I practice speaking with native speakers?
answer: Yes! Our community features include live conversation sessions with native speakers, speaking clubs, and one-on-one tutoring sessions. You can also practice with AI-powered speaking exercises available 24/7.

question: Are the certificates recognized?
answer: Our certificates are recognized by many employers and educational institutions. We partner with international language assessment organizations to ensure our certifications meet global standards.

question: How much does LinguaCraft cost?
answer: We offer a free tier with basic lessons and community access. Premium plans start at $19/month and include unlimited access to all courses, live sessions, and personalized tutoring. We also offer annual discounts.

question: Can I learn offline?
answer: Yes! Our mobile app allows you to download lessons for offline study. You can access vocabulary, grammar exercises, and audio content without an internet connection.

question: How long does it take to see results?
answer: Most students see noticeable improvement within 2-4 weeks of consistent daily practice. Our adaptive learning system tracks your progress and provides personalized recommendations to accelerate your learning.

question: Do you offer business English courses?
answer: Absolutely! We have specialized business English courses covering presentations, meetings, negotiations, email writing, and industry-specific vocabulary for various professional fields.
